text: When you implement Python code to process numerical data or work with array, matrix, math functions, you should know the two important libraries: NumPy (Numerical Python) and SciPy (Scientific Python). In general, while these libraries provide quite similar functionalities. there are differences between them and these differences can be summarized in two main points: (1) Numpy does not support all algebraic functions in depth while Scipy does (2) Numpy has a faster processing speed compared to Scipy. As a result, you should always try to see if Numpy can support what you want to do. In cases using Numpy is not enough to solve your problem, let's explore Scipy. #python #numpy #scipy #difference
